overview: This found footage compilation of Albania’s turbulent 20th century history is also a bitter and telling essay on the nation’s worship of personality cults and a warning of false prophets to come. Ironically, this anti-communist examination was made by Kujtim Gjonaj, who’d also directed DHIMBJE E THELLË, BETIM I MADH (Deep Grief, Big Oath), the doc glorifying Enver Hoxha, eight years earlier.
title: The Fall of the Idols
